page.title: 20Acknowledgements- Mattingley
page.content: The writing of the text, the photographs & all the research for this 'block' has been carried out by Mrs. Glynis Wilsdon for the Hook Environmental Group (with the help of her sons Andrew - 3 & Christopher 1). The Hook Environmental Group would like to thank the following people for their part in this nationwide Domesday Project:- Mattingley Parish Council, Hart District Council, Hampshire County Council, (Library & Education Depts.), officers at Hartley Wintney Police Station, local Headteachers & the numerous local people who were interviewed, in particular the following residents: Miles Hudson, John Harvey (& family) & the Rev. Arnold Bennett. Special thanks go to Mrs. Jane Bonnin of the Hook Environmental Group for transferring the text to the computer disc.
